00019 /* alloca is cleaner than malloc/free when appropriate.  The storage
00020  *  is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00076 static double R_INLINE sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00077 {
00078     double ans = 0;
00079     int i;
00080 
00081     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00082     return ans;
00083 }
00084 
00093 static int R_INLINE Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00094 {
00095     int i;
00096     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00097     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00098     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00099 }

00113 *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)

00116     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;

00127 static double R_INLINE
00128 Mer_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* deviance)
00129 {
00130     return sqrt(exp(deviance[lpdisc_POS])/
00131                 ((double)(dims[n_POS] - (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))));
00132 }

00142 static double
00143 chm_log_det2(CHM_FR L)
00144 {
00145     double ans = 0;
00146     int i;
00147 
00148     if (L->is_super) {
00149         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00150             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00151                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00152             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00153 
00154             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00155                 ans += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00156             }
00157         }
00158     } else {
00159         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00160         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00161         
00162         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00163             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00164             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00165             ans += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00166         }
00167     }
00168     return ans;
00169 }
00170 
00184 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00185 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00186 {
00187     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00188 
00189     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00190         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00191         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00192 
00193         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00194         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00195         nc[i] = nci;
00196         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00197     }
00198     return ans;
00199 }
00200 
00215 static int
00216 Vt_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00217        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00218 {
00219     int ans, i, p;
00220 
00221     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00222     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00223         int zrow = zi[p];
00224         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00225 
00226         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00227         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00228             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00229             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00230                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00231         }
00232     }
00233     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00234     return ans;
00235 }
00236 
00252 static void
00253 TSPp_dense_mult(double *dx, int nf, int m, int n, double **st,
00254                 const int *nc, const int *nlev, const int *Gp,
00255                 const double *sx, const int *Perm)
00256 {
00257     int i, j, k;
00258     double *tmp = Alloca(m, double), one = 1;
00259     R_CheckStack(); 
00260 
00261     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00262                                 /* apply permutation if given */
00263         if (Perm) for (i = 0; i < m; i++) tmp[Perm[i]] = sx[j * m + i];
00264         else Memcpy(tmp, sx + j * m, m);
00265         for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00266             for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00267                 double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00268                 int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00269                 for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) tmp[base + kk] *= dd;
00270             }
00271             if (nc[i] > 1) {    /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00272                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00273                                 st[i], nc + i, tmp + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00274             }
00275         }
00276         Memcpy(dx + j * m, tmp, m);
00277     }
00278 }
00279 
00290 static void
00291 TSPp_SEXP_mult(SEXP dest, SEXP ST, const int *Gp, SEXP src, const int *Perm)
00292 {
00293     int isM = isMatrix(src), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00294     int m = isM ? INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol))[0] : LENGTH(src),
00295         n = isM ? INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol))[1] : 1;
00296     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00297     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00298     R_CheckStack(); 
00299 
00300     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00301     TSPp_dense_mult(REAL(dest), nf, m, n, st, nc, nlev, Gp, REAL(src), Perm);
00302 }

00313 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00314 {
00315     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00316         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00317         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00318         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00319     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00320         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00321     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00322         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00323         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00324     R_CheckStack();
00325     
00326     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00327     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00328     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00329     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00330         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00331         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00332             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00333             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00334                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00335             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00336         }
00337     }
00338     return R_NilValue;
00339 }
00340 
00351 static void
00352 PSTp_dense_mult(SEXP dest, SEXP ST, const int *Gp, SEXP src, int *Perm)
00353 {
00354     double *dx = REAL(dest), *sx = REAL(src);
00355     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k;
00356     int m = dims[0], n = dims[1], ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00357     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00358     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*), *tmp = Alloca(m, double), one = 1;
00359     R_CheckStack(); 
00360 
00361     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00362     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00363         Memcpy(tmp, sx + j * m, m);
00364         for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00365             if (nc[i] > 1) {    /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i' */
00366                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00367                                 st[i], nc + i, tmp + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00368             }
00369             for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00370                 double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00371                 int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00372                 for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) tmp[base + kk] *= dd;
00373             }
00374         }
00375                                 /* apply permutation if given */
00376         if (Perm) for (i = 0; i < m; i++) dx[j * m + i] = tmp[Perm[i]];
00377         else Memcpy(dx + j * m, tmp, m);
00378     }
00379 }

00389 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00390 {
00391     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00392     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00393     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00394         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00395         double *st = REAL(STi);
00396         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00397         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00398 
00399         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00400             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00401         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00402             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00403                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00404     }
00405     return pars;
00406 }

00415 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00416 {
00417     SEXP ans =
00418         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00419                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00420     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00421     UNPROTECT(1); 
00422     return ans;
00423 }
00424 
00432 static void
00433 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00434 {
00435     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00436     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00437     CHM_SP cVt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VtSym)),
00438         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00439     int *vi = (int*)(cVt->i), *vp = (int*)(cVt->p),
00440         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00441         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00442     int vnnz = vp[cVt->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00443     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00444     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00445         *vx = (double*)(cVt->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00446         one[] = {1,0};
00447     R_CheckStack();
00448 
00449     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00450                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00451     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00452         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00453         double *sti = st[i];
00454 
00455         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00456             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00457         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00458             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00459                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00460     }
00461                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00462                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00463     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00464     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00465         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00466         for (j = 0; j < cVt->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00467             int pv = vp[j];
00468             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00469                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00470                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00471                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and Vt structures, j = %d"), j);
00472                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00473             }
00474         }
00475     }
00476                                 /* When T != I multiply Vt on the left by T' */
00477     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00478         for (j = 0; j < cVt->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00479             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00480                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00481 
00482                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00483                 else {
00484                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00485                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00486                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00487                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00488                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00489                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00490                 }
00491             }
00492                                 /* Multiply Vt on the left by S */
00493     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00494         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00495         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00496     }
00497 }

00508 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00509 {
00510     int npar = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS];
00511 
00512     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00513         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00514     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00515     return R_NilValue;
00516 }

00519 
00527 SEXP nlmer_create_A(SEXP Vt, SEXP sP)
00528 {
00529     int n, p, s = asInteger(sP);
00530     CHM_SP ans;
00531     CHM_TR tA = M_cholmod_sparse_to_triplet(AS_CHM_SP(Vt), &c);
00532     R_CheckStack();
00533 
00534     if (s <= 0) error(_("s must be > 0"));
00535     if (tA->ncol % s)
00536         error(_("Number of columns in Vt, %d, is not a multiple of s = %d"),
00537               tA->ncol, s);
00538     n = tA->ncol /= s;
00539     for (p = 0; p < tA->nnz; p++) ((int*)(tA->j))[p] %= tA->ncol;
00540     ans = M_cholmod_triplet_to_sparse(tA, tA->nnz, &c);
00541     M_cholmod_free_triplet(&tA, &c);
00542     return M_chm_sparse_to_SEXP(ans, 1, 0, 0, "", R_NilValue);
00543 }

00546 /* Functions common to all forms of mixed models */

00548 /* FIXME: Watch the definition of this scale factor.  It may be more
00549  * appropriate to use the weighted, penalized residual sum of squares
00550  * than to use the deviance. */
00559 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00560 {
00561     int w = asInteger(which);
00562                 
00563     return ScalarReal(Mer_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && isREML(x)),
00564                                 INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
00565                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00566 }
00567 
00576 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x, SEXP uS)
00577 {
00578     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00579         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00580     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00581     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00582     int i, j, k;
00583     double *vv, one[] = {1,0},
00584         sc = asLogical(uS) ?
00585              Mer_sigma(isREML(x), dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)))
00586             : 1;
00587     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00588     CHM_DN dm1;
00589     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00590     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00591         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00592     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00593     R_CheckStack();
00594 
00595     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00596     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00597     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00598         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00599         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00600                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00601                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00602 
00603         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00604         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00605         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00606         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00607             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00608         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00609             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00610             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00611                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i]];
00612             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00613             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00614             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00615             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00616             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00617             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00618             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00619             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00620             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00621                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00622                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00623                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00624                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00625             }
00626         }
00627         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00628     }
00629     UNPROTECT(1);
00630     return ans;
00631 }
00632 
00640 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP Vt)
00641 {
00642     double one[] = {1, 0};
00643     int fll = c.final_ll;
00644     CHM_SP cVt = AS_CHM_SP(Vt);
00645     CHM_FR L;
00646     R_CheckStack();
00647 
00648     c.final_ll = 1;
00649     L = M_cholmod_analyze(cVt, &c);
00650     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(cVt, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00651         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00652               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00653     c.final_ll = fll;
00654 
00655     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00656 }

00661 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00662 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;

00667 
00677 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00678 {
00679     SEXP X = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
00680         moff = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00681         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00682     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00683     int i, ione = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
00684     int nans = n * dims[s_POS];
00685     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00686         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00687         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00688         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00689         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00690         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00691         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00692         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00693         one[] = {1,0};
00694     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00695     CHM_SP cVt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VtSym));
00696     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, nans, 1),
00697         cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym));
00698     R_CheckStack();
00699 
00700 /* FIXME: Should the option of not storing X be allowed? */
00701     if (!INTEGER(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol))[0]) { /* X not stored */
00702         for (i = 0; i < nans; i++) eta[i] = NA_REAL;
00703         return NA_REAL;
00704     }
00705                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00706     if (LENGTH(moff)) Memcpy(eta, REAL(moff), nans);
00707     else AZERO(eta, nans);
00708                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00709     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &nans, &p, one, REAL(X), &nans,
00710                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &ione,
00711                     one, eta, &ione);
00712                                 /* eta := eta + V P' u */
00713     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00714     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cVt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00715         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00716     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00717 
00718     if (LENGTH(v)) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00719         SEXP rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym);
00720         SEXP gg, pnames = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pnamesSym), vv;
00721         int *gdims, s = dims[s_POS];
00722         
00723         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00724             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00725                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00726             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00727                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00728                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00729             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00730         }
00731         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_modelSym), rho));
00732         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00733             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00734         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00735         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00736             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00737         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00738         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00739             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00740                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00741                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00742                                  * pnames has been checked */
00743         SET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym, vv);
00744         UNPROTECT(1);
00745         eta = REAL(vv);
00746     }
00747                                 /* eta now points to an n vector  */
00748     if (muEta) {        /* apply the generalized linear part */
00749         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00750         case 1:                 /* binomial with logit link */
00751             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00752                 double etai = eta[i];
00753                 double tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00754                     ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00755                 mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00756                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00757             }
00758             break;
00759         case 2:                 /* binomial with probit link */
00760             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00761                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00762                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00763             }
00764             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00765                 double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00766                 mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00767                     ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00768                      pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00769                 var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00770                 tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00771                 muEta[i] =
00772                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00773             }
00774             break;
00775         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00776             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00777                 double tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00778                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] =
00779                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00780             }
00781             break;
00782         default:
00783             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00784         } 
00785     } else {
00786         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00787     }
00788 
00789     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00790     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00791         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (swt ? swt[i] : 1);
00792         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00793     }
00794                                 /* store u'u */
00795     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00796     
00797     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00798 }
00799 
00810 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00811 {
00812     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00813 }
00814 
00825 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00826 {
00827     SEXP vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00828     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00829     int j, jv, lv = LENGTH(vP),
00830         n = dims[n_POS], p, s = dims[s_POS];
00831     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00832         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00833         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00834         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00835         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00836         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00837         one[] = {1,0};
00838     CHM_SP Vt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VtSym));
00839     CHM_SP A = Vt;
00840     int *ai = (int*) NULL, *ap = (int*) NULL,
00841         *vi = (int*) Vt->i, *vp = (int*) Vt->p;
00842     double *ax = (double*) NULL, *vx = (double*) Vt->x;
00843     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00844     R_CheckStack();
00845 
00846     if (lv || muEta || swt) {   /* must generate A from C */
00847         A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00848         R_CheckStack();
00849         ai = (int*)(A->i); ap = (int*)(A->p); ax = (double*)(A->x);
00850         
00851         if (lv) { /* apply the gradient from the nonlinear model */
00852             double *grad = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
00853             
00854             AZERO(ax, ap[n]);
00855             for (jv = 0; jv < n * s; jv++) {
00856                 int iv, ja = jv % n, ia;
00857                 for (iv = vp[jv]; iv < vp[jv + 1]; iv++) {
00858                     for (ia = ap[ja]; ia < ap[ja + 1]; ia++)
00859                         if (ai[ia] == vi[iv]) break;
00860                     if (ia == ap[ja + 1])
00861                         error(_("Structure of A incompatible with Vt, jv = %d, iv = %d"),
00862                               jv, iv);
00863                     ax[ia] += grad[jv] * vx[iv];
00864                 }
00865             }
00866         } else {                /* copy contents of Vt to A */
00867             Memcpy(ax, vx, ap[n]);
00868         }
00869 
00870         if (swt) {              /* update swt and res. Apply swt and,
00871                                  * if used, muEta to A */
00872             double *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
00873                 *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym);
00874             d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00875             for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00876                 swt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / (var ? var[j] : 1));
00877                 res[j] = swt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00878                 d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00879                 for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00880                     ax[p] *= (muEta ? muEta[j] : 1) * swt[j];
00881             }
00882         }
00883     }
00884 
00885     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00886         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00887               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00888     d[ldL2_POS] = chm_log_det2(L);
00889     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00890 }
00891 
00903 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00904 {
00905     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00906 }
00907 
00909 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00910 
00911 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00912 
00913 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00914 
00924 static int cond_mode(SEXP x, int verb)
00925 {
00926     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00927     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00928     double
00929         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00930         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)),
00931         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00932         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, one[] = {1,0},
00933         step, zero[] = {0,0};
00934     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double),
00935         *uold = Alloca(q, double);
00936     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00937     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00938         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00939     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00940     R_CheckStack();
00941 
00942     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00943     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00944 
00945     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00946      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00947      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00948      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00949 
00950     AZERO(u, q);
00951     update_mu(x);
00952     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00953 
00954         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00955         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00956                                 /* tmp := A %*% W^{1/2} %*% (y-mu) */
00957         if (!(M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 0 /* no trans */, one, zero,
00958                                cres, ctmp, &c))) 
00959             error(_("cholmod_sdmult returned error code"));
00960                                 /* tmp := P %*% tmp - u */
00961         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_P, L, ctmp, &c);
00962         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] = ((double*)(sol->x))[j] - u[j];
00963         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00964                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
00965         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
00966             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
00967         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00968         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00969                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
00970         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
00971         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
00972                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
00973         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
00974             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
00975         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00976         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00977 
00978         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
00979             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
00980             pwrss = update_mu(x);
00981             if (verb < 0)
00982                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
00983                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
00984             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
00985                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
00986                 break;
00987             }
00988         }
00989         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
00990     }
00991     return i;
00992 }
00993 
01005 SEXP mer_condMode(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01006 {
01007     return ScalarInteger(cond_mode(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01008 }
01009 
01018 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
01019 {
01020     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
01021 }
01022 
01030 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01031 {
01032     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
01033     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01034     int i, n = dims[n_POS];
01035 
01036     d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
01037     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) { /* generalized */
01038         SEXP pwtp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
01039         int pw = LENGTH(pwtp);
01040         double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01041             *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
01042             *wts = REAL(pwtp),
01043             *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym));
01044 
01045         d[disc_POS] = 0;
01046         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
01047         case 1:               /* binomial with logit or probit link */
01048         case 2:
01049             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01050                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
01051                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
01052                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
01053             }
01054             break;
01055         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
01056             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01057                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
01058                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
01059                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
01060             }
01061             break;
01062         default:
01063             error(_("General form of glmer_dev_resids not yet written"));
01064         }
01065     }
01066 
01067     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01068     return R_NilValue;
01069 }
01070 
01079 SEXP mer_update_effects(SEXP x)
01080 {
01081     SEXP muEta = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01082         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
01083     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01084     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01085     R_CheckStack();
01086 
01087     if (!(LENGTH(muEta) || LENGTH(v))) { /* linear mixed model */
01088         SEXP uvec = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01089         int ione = 1, p = dims[p_POS], pp1 = dims[p_POS] + 1,
01090             q = dims[q_POS];
01091         double *RXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01092             *RVXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01093             *dev = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01094             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01095             *u = REAL(uvec), mone = -1, one = 1;
01096         CHM_DN cu = AS_CHM_DN(uvec), sol;
01097         R_CheckStack();
01098 
01099         Memcpy(fixef, RXy + p * pp1, p);
01100         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RXy, &pp1, fixef, &ione);
01101         Memcpy(u, RVXy + p * q, q);
01102         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, RVXy, &q,
01103                         fixef, &ione, &one, u, &ione);
01104         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
01105             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
01106         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01107         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01108         dev[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
01109         dev[disc_POS] = exp(dev[lpdisc_POS]) - dev[usqr_POS];
01110     }
01111     TSPp_SEXP_mult(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01112                    GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01113                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
01114                    GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01115                    (int *)L->Perm);
01116     return R_NilValue;
01117 }
01118 
01130 SEXP mer_create_Vt(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01131 {
01132     SEXP ans;
01133     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01134         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01135     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01136     R_CheckStack();
01137 
01138                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01139     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01140         return duplicate(Zt);
01141                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01142     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01143     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01144     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01145     R_CheckStack();
01146 
01147     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01148     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01149     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01150         nnz[j] = Vt_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01151         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01152     }
01153     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01154                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01155     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01156     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01157     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01158                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01159     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01160     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01161     vp[0] = 0;
01162     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01163     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01164                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01165     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01166     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01167     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01168         int i, pos = vp[j];
01169         Vt_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01170         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01171     }
01172                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01173     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01174     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01175 
01176     UNPROTECT(1); 
01177     return ans;
01178 }
01179 
01187 static double
01188 profiled_deviance(SEXP x)
01189 {
01190     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01191     int j, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
01192     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01193         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01194         *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01195         *v = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_vSym),
01196         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01197         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01198     SEXP RVXy = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym);
01199     CHM_DN cRVXy = AS_CHM_DN(RVXy), ans;
01200     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01201     int pp1 = cRVXy->ncol, q = cRVXy->nrow;
01202     R_CheckStack();
01203 
01204     if (v || muEta)
01205         error(_("profiled_deviance applies only to linear mer objects"));
01206     update_L(x);
01207 /* FIXME: PAW^{1/2}[X:y] on the fly and eliminate the ZtXy slot. */
01208                                 /* Evaluate PST'Z'[X:y] in RVXy */
01209     PSTp_dense_mult(RVXy, GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01210                     INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
01211                     GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtXySym), (int*)(L->Perm));
01212                                 /* solve for RVXy */
01213     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRVXy, &c);
01214     Memcpy(REAL(RVXy), (double*)(ans->x), q * pp1);
01215     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01216                                 /* downdate XytXy  */
01217     F77_CALL(dlacpy)("U", &pp1, &pp1, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XytXySym)),
01218                      &pp1, rxy, &pp1);
01219     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &pp1, &q, mone, REAL(RVXy),
01220                     &q, one, rxy, &pp1);
01221     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &pp1, rxy, &pp1, &j);
01222     if (j)
01223         error(_("Downdated [X:y]'[X:y] is not positive definite, %d."),
01224               j);
01225     d[lpdisc_POS] = 2 * log(rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1]);
01226     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < (pp1 - 1); j++)
01227         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (pp1 + 1)]);
01228     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01229         dn * (1 + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2 * PI / dn));
01230     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01231         dnmp * (1. + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01232     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01233 }
01234 
01243 SEXP
01244 mer_profiled_deviance(SEXP x)
01245 {
01246     return ScalarReal(profiled_deviance(x));
01247 }
01248 
01258 SEXP 
01259 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01260 {
01261     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01262     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01263         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01264     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01265                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym))),
01266         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01267 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe). */
01268     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01269     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01270     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01271     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01272     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01273     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01274         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01275     R_CheckStack();
01276 
01277     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01278     if (!lmm) {
01279         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01280 
01281         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01282         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01283         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01284         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01285     }
01286                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01287     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01288     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01289                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01290     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01291         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01292     }
01293                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01294     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01295         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01296         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01297         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01298     }
01299     do {
01300         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and Vt */
01301         if (lmm)
01302             fx = profiled_deviance(x);
01303         else {
01304             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01305             cond_mode(x, verb);
01306             mer_update_dev(x);
01307             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01308         }
01309         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01310     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01311     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01312     return R_NilValue;
01313 }
01314 
01315 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01316 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01317 
01330 static double
01331 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01332 {
01333     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01334 
01335     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01336         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01337     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01338         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01339         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01340             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01341                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01342             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01343             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01344         }
01345     }
01346     return ans;
01347 }
01348 
01358 SEXP
01359 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01360 {
01361     SEXP ans;
01362     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01363         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01364     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01365 
01366     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01367         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01368     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01369     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01370     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01371     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01372     R_CheckStack();
01373 
01374     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01375     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01376     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01377     if (j)
01378         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01379     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01380     ansp = REAL(ans);
01381     GetRNGstate();
01382     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01383         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01384         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01385         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01386                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01387         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01388                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01389                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01390 
01391         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01392             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01393                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01394     }
01395 
01396     PutRNGstate();
01397     UNPROTECT(1);
01398     return ans;
01399 }
01400 
01401 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01402 
01403 
01412 static void mer_MCMC_betab(SEXP x, double sigma)
01413 {
01414     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01415         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01416     int ione = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01417     int pp1 = p + 1;
01418     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01419     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01420     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01421     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01422     R_CheckStack();
01423 
01424     mer_update_effects(x);
01425                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01426     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01427     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01428                     &pp1, del2, &ione);
01429     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01430                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01431     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01432     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01433                     &q, del2, &ione, &one, del1, &ione);
01434     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01435     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01436     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01437                                 /* Update the random effects */
01438     TSPp_SEXP_mult(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym), GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01439                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)), uvecP, (int*)(L->Perm));
01440 }
01441 
01442 static void
01443 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01444 {
01445     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01446     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01447         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01448         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01449 
01450     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01451     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01452     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01453     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01454         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01455         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01456         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01457     }
01458 }
01459 
01460 static void mer_MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01461 {
01462     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01463     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01464         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01465     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01466         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01467     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01468     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01469     R_CheckStack();
01470 
01471     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01472     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01473     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01474     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01475     R_CheckStack();
01476     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01477         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01478         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01479         
01480         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01481         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01482                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01483         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01484         else {
01485             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01486             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01487             if (info)
01488                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01489         }
01490                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01491         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01492         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01493                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01494         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01495                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01496         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01497                         &zero, var, &nci);
01498         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01499             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01500         }
01501         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01502             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01503                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01504                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01505                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01506             }
01507         }
01508         if (nci == 1) {
01509             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01510         } else {
01511             double *sti = st[i];
01512 
01513             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01514                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01515                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01516                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01517             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01518             if (info)
01519                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01520             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01521                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01522                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01523                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01524             }
01525         }
01526     }
01527 }
01528 
01542 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01543                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01544 {
01545     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01546     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01547     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01548         n = dims[n_POS], nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01549         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01550         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01551         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01552     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01553         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01554         *ranef = (double*)NULL, df = n - (dims[REML_POS] ? p : 0);
01555     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01556     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01557 
01558     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01559     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01560     ansp = REAL(ans);
01561     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01562     GetRNGstate();
01563     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01564     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01565 
01566     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01567         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01568                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01569         sigma = exp(deviance[lpdisc_POS]/2)/sqrt(rchisq(df));
01570         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01571         mer_update_effects(x);  /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01572         mer_MCMC_betab(x, sigma); /* Updated beta, u and b */
01573         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01574         if (saveb)                                 /* store b */
01575             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01576         mer_MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01577 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     /\* Refactor and evaluate deviance *\/ */
01578         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01579         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01580         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01581     }
01582     PutRNGstate();
01583                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01584     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01585 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01586 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01587     UNPROTECT(2);
01588     return ans;
01589 }
01590 
01603 static char
01604 *chkDims(char *buf, int nb, char *nm, SEXP MP, int nr, int nc)
01605 {
01606     int *dd = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) :
01607         (int *)NULL;
01608 
01609     if (!dd) error(_("Argument MP to chkDims is not a matrix"));
01610     buf[0] = '\0';
01611     if (!isReal(MP) || dd[0] != nr || dd[1] != nc)
01612         snprintf(buf, nb, "Matrix %s must be a %d by %d numeric matrix",
01613                 nm, nr, nc);
01614     return buf;
01615 }
01616 
01625 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01626 {
01627     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01628         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01629         XP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
01630         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01631         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01632         etaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym),
01633         fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01634         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym),
01635         muP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym),
01636         muEtaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01637         offsetP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
01638         ranefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01639         residP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym),
01640         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01641         vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym),
01642         weightsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
01643         y = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym);
01644     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01645     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS],
01646         nq, p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01647     int neta = n * s;
01648     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01649         Vt =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VtSym));
01650     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01651     R_CheckStack();
01652                                 /* check lengths */
01653     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01654         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01655     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01656         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01657     if (LENGTH(y) != n)
01658         return mkString(_("Slot y must have length dims['n']"));
01659     if (LENGTH(muP) != n)
01660         return mkString(_("Slot mu must have length dims['n']"));
01661     if (LENGTH(residP) != n)
01662         return mkString(_("Slot resid must have length dims['n']"));
01663     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01664         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01665     if (LENGTH(fixefP) != p)
01666         return mkString(_("Slot fixef must have length ['p']"));
01667     if (LENGTH(ranefP) != q)
01668         return mkString(_("Slot ranef must have length dims['q']"));
01669     if (LENGTH(uvecP) != q)
01670         return mkString(_("Slot uvec must have length dims['q']"));
01671     if (LENGTH(etaP) != neta)
01672         return mkString(_("Slot eta must have length dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01673     if (LENGTH(weightsP) && LENGTH(weightsP) != n)
01674         return mkString(_("Slot weights must have length 0 or dims['n']"));
01675     if (LENGTH(offsetP) && LENGTH(offsetP) != n)
01676         return mkString(_("Slot offset must have length 0 or dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01677     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01678         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01679         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01680     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01681         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01682         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01683     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01684         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01685     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != neta)
01686         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01687     if (Vt->nrow != q || Vt->ncol != neta)
01688         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01689     dd = INTEGER(getAttrib(XP, R_DimSymbol)); 
01690     if (!isReal(XP) || dd[1] != p)
01691         return mkString(_("Slot X must be a numeric matrix with dims['p'] columns"));
01692     if (dd[0] != 0 && dd[0] != (n * s)) /* special case */
01693         return mkString(_("Slot X must be have 0 or dims['n']*dims['s'] rows"));
01694 
01695     nq = 0;
01696     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01697         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01698         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01699         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01700             return
01701                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01702         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01703             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01704         if (!isFactor(fli))
01705             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01706         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01707     }
01708     if (q != nq)
01709         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01710 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01711 
01712 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01713 #endif  
01714     if (!(LENGTH(vP) || LENGTH(muEtaP))) { /* linear mixed model */
01715         int pp1 = p + 1;
01716         char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01717         R_CheckStack();
01718 
01719         if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "ZtXy",
01720                            GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtXySym), q, pp1)))
01721             return mkString(buf);
01722         if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "XytXy",
01723                            GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XytXySym), pp1, pp1)))
01724             return mkString(buf);
01725         if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RXy",
01726                            GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym), pp1, pp1)))
01727             return mkString(buf);
01728         if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RVXy",
01729                            GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym), q, pp1)))
01730             return mkString(buf);
01731     }
01732     return ScalarLogical(1);
01733 }
01734 
01735 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01736 
01746 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01747 {
01748     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01749     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01750         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01751         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01752         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01753         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01754     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01755 
01756     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01757     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01758     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01759         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01760         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01761             F[i] = 0;
01762             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01763         } else {
01764             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01765                 F[i] = 0;
01766                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01767             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01768                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01769                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01770                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01771                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01772                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01773                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01774                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01775                             int ii = ai[k];
01776                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01777                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01778                         }
01779                     }
01780                 }
01781             }
01782         }
01783         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01784     }
01785     return ans;
01786 }
01787 
01788 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01801 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01802 {
01803     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01804     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01805     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01806         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01807         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01808     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01809       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01810     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01811         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01812     R_CheckStack();
01813     
01814     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01815     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01816         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01817         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01818         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01819     }
01820     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01821     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01822     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01823     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01824         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01825         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01826                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01827         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01828         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01829             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01830         }
01831         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01832             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01833         }
01834     
01835         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01836         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01837         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01838         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01839             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01840             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01841             if (S) {
01842                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01843                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01844                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01845                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01846                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01847             }
01848             if (D) {
01849                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01850                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01851             }
01852             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01853             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01854             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01855                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01856                                       * evaluated */
01857         } 
01858     }
01859     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01860     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01861     UNPROTECT(1);
01862     return ans;
01863 }
